reviews.review: Vuelvo a esta maravilla de juego ;O

Used to play CS 1.6 a while ago. Came to this game just to try it out because it was cheap on sale (before the free to play was introduced) and I liked it enough to play from time to time. As with any multiplayer game there's good people to play with and there's toxic people, but usualy people I got matched with were just there to have some fun and my experience was great. I would recommend this game.
Best and Simplest, Yet Strategic Shooter Ever Made Period!!!!

I recommend this game to others, preferably more mature personnel and not kids under age 13.  I dislike the employment of sniper rifles, as if they are "quick draw/fast use" weapons.  More realistic would require someone to take time to actually use at a distant, without the ability to jump out from behind/corners and walls to use them.

In my opinion it's one one hardest most good shooting game. But The Fact Is That It's To Hard  To Start Off, Even Training Doesn't Help. I think for starters it's too hard, i've had this game for 4-5 years and yet i still can't do it. Only Play If Your Very Experienced -- Hardcore -- Player In Shooting Games. Cases Are To Hard To Unbox When The Keys Are Rare To Get And You Can Only Earn Them From Playing with Real Players. Beginners Are Really Gonna Have A Really Hard Even Earning Boxes And Keys. The Gameplay Is Really Boring, And I Mean 7 Rounds In The Game And Your Going To Really To Wanting To Play Something Else in only 5 mins. My Rating would be 4/10. The Developers Really Failed At The Fun in The Gameplay.

Say what you want, but your game collection can't be complete without this masterpiece. It's able to enrage you with a heretic level of rage, while also being able to reward you with the sweet, sweet feeling of accomplishment.

This game is ideal for laid-back people, who won't obliterate their setup out of existence, so if you tend to get aggressive, maybe your collection will be perfectly good without CS:GO.
